description: EF Core migration depends on domain entity definitions.
mitigation_plan: Ensure entity design is stable before starting migration work.

description: E2E tests for login require the complete login feature stack to be implemented.
mitigation_plan: QA to work in parallel setting up test framework while feature is developed.
impact_if_delayed: Delays validation of a critical security feature.

description: Integration of the GPU rendering pipeline depends on the successful validation from the DirectX spike.
mitigation_plan: The spike itself is the mitigation. If it fails, the contingency plan (CPU rendering) must be activated.

description: The RabbitMQ consumer (Task 29) cannot be fully tested without a reliable way to get messages into the queue, which is validated by the C-STORE E2E test (Task 28).
mitigation_plan: Develop a simple message publisher tool for isolated testing of the consumer.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the completion of the ingestion pipeline.
